Class ConversationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • message_system.ConversationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ConversationManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Use Case class. Stores every Conversation within the program (more suitable for Conversations to be stored in a DB for phase 2).
    See Also:
